name: Drona HQ
description: #Empowering you to build digital tools, streamline processes, and drive your productivity. Allowing you to focus on delivering high impact work, efficiently.
features: DronaHQ SaaS Platform offers unlimited apps and connectors across all plans with: - Visual development - Drag and Drop UI/UX Builder - Ready database connectors - API Connectors - Web & Mobile apps - Automations - Business logic editor - Custom branding - SSO - Embeddable Apps - PDF generator
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: DronaHQ - low code platform for engineering teams to democratize custom application development.
ShortDescription: Low Code App Development Platform to build rich web & mobile apps at speed. Internal tools, GUI, Admin Panels, CRUD.

Highlights.name: Build Your First App
Highlights.description: This tutorial guides you through the steps to create a simple database GUI using Dronahq. The application connects to a sample PostgreSQL database, allowing you to read and update customer information.

Highlights.name: Connecting Datasources
Highlights.description: Databases play a crucial role in numerous applications, serving as the backbone for storing and managing data. With DronaHQ, you have the capability to execute queries for data retrieval and modification directly from its intuitive editor.

enhanced_description: Drona HQ is a low-code SaaS platform designed to empower engineering teams to rapidly build digital tools, streamline processes, and enhance productivity by democratizing custom application development. It offers a visual development environment with a drag-and-drop UI/UX builder, enabling the creation of rich web and mobile applications, internal tools, GUIs, admin panels, and CRUD applications. The platform supports unlimited apps and connectors, featuring ready database and API connectors, automation capabilities, a business logic editor, custom branding, SSO, embeddable apps, and a PDF generator. It facilitates the building of database GUIs and direct data source querying.
target_industries: Any industry requiring custom internal tools and applications
competitive_advantages: Low-code visual development for rapid application building
Unlimited apps and connectors across all plans
Broad connectivity with ready database and API connectors
Comprehensive feature set for app creation including automations and business logic editor
implementation_scenarios: Building new custom web and mobile applications
Developing internal tools for specific business needs
Embedding applications into existing digital environments or portals
roi_benefits: Increased productivity through streamlined processes and digital tools
Faster application development time due to low-code approach
Democratization of custom application development, reducing reliance on extensive coding
Improved efficiency in daily operations and specific HR functions like hiring
Enhanced hiring manager confidence and productivity
scalability_features: Unlimited apps and connectors across all plans
